body:
If you don't know already, I do some basic GFX, and I'm really bored.... ;-; If you want a C4D + Photoshop edit tell me the following information please :)

Text?:
Color scheme:
Position (image examples):
Banner / Icon / 1080p icon / Square Icon:
Held items (Right hand + Left hand):
Extra edits?:
Fighting (a 1v1?):
Chill?: [Yes / No]

Examples:





Side notes: Some images may take 1 - 3 days to create, depending on the requests, but I'm fairly good with GFX, and can make them quick

If you don't know already, I do some basic VFX, and I'm really bored.... ;-; If you want a C4D + After Effects edit tell me the following information please :)

Text? [NO MINECRAFT ANIMATION ATM]:
Color Scheme:
Effects:
Extra Edits?:
Chill?:
Song?:

Examples:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JRJy-D4OMZU

Side note: Intro make take up to 1 week to complete :/
 
>>>NEW<<< MONTAGES:
If you've seen my avicus promo, I do edits of minecraft gameplay and such, so you can order a montage from me as well :)

 
Reason for the montage:
YOU MUST have 100+ Subscribers on youtube, or 25+ Followers on twitter: (Yes / No) (If no, its automatically denied) [Exceptions "CAN" be made]
Effects if any:
Sync?:
Any plugins you want used (S_Shake, Twitch, Pan-Crop):
PROVIDE CLIPS @ PhyreCore@gmail.com
IF the montage needs to exceed 2:45 minutes, it will need to be payed, anything below 2:45 is FREE.
Type (Minecraft, COD):
SIDE NOTE: May take up to 1 month to complete, BE PATIENT.
Examples: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EsxXSWqWByg
